page.title: 06 PETS SURVEY
page.content:
WE ASKED CHILDREN IN CLASSES ONE AND TWO OF ROADE PRIMARY SCHOOL WHICH SORTS OF PETS THEY OWNED.WE DID NOT COUNT FARM OR WORKING ANIMALS. WHERE SOMEONE HAD LOTS OF THE SAME SORT OF PETS,THEY WERE COUNTED AS ONE.THERE WERE SIXTY THREE CHILDEN ALTOGETHER.HERE ARE THE PETS THEY OWN.
CATS ..19 DOGS ..27 RABBITS ..11 HAMSTERS .. 4 FISH(INDOORS).14 FISH(OUTDOORS) 7 BUDGERIGARS .14 OTHER BIRDS .. 6 GUINEA PIGS .. 4 OTHER PETS ..12 NO PETS ..12 --------------------------------------- MANY PEOPLE IN ROADE COMPLAIN ABOUT THE WAY IT WHICH A FEW THOUGHTLESS DOG OWNERS LET THEIR ANIMALS FOUL PAVEMENTS AND CHILDREN'S PLAY AREAS.
